DOC.brief_summary: To determine and compare the effective intrathecal dose of levobupivacaine, ropivacaine and bupivacaine for 50% of patients in lower limb surgery
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Comparison on the Dose Requirement Between, Levobupivacaine, Ropivacaine and Bupivacaine in Intrathecal Anaesthesia
DOC.criteria: body weight=4090kg, height higher than 145cm Known hypersensitivity to amide local anaesthetics, patients who do not understand English and Chinese, Body mass index higher than 35 kg per sq metre
DOC.keyword: Patients who are going to have regional anaesthesia for lower limbs surgery.
